g.text: topotactic relationships to the host (olivine), Anh‐B crystals show strong topotactic relationships to
parent olivine grains. This suggests that in olivine, Anh‐B (and stishovite) can form due to kinetic reasons
(lower nucleation energy barrier) as a meta‐stable phase.
